turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you order me a Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which location do you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Target on Cobb's Ford Road in Prattville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Americano with 2 pumps of caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.  Should they leave you room for cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah. Oh! But I do want whip cream on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. And you said 2 pumps of caramel?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'll call it in now. Put it on your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Wait, I think I just want one pump of caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. You sure? You got vanilla last time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, vanilla does sound good. But no. No. Definitely caramel. Just one pump.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I've got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, great, and you're going to charge it to my account, right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sending the receipt to your mobile.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll be ready soon at Target on Cobbs Ford Road in Prattville.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks! Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Bye.
